original_title: Ninguém Ama Ninguém por Mais de Dois Anos
overview: "No one loves anyone for more than two years" is an adaptation of Nelson Rodrigues' work about five couples that live in Brazil in the early 60's, who are seen by the society as conventional people, but whose intimate lives turn out to be morally questionable.
title: Ninguém Ama Ninguém por Mais de Dois Anos
